metadata.title: CVE-2018-10111 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GEGL through 0.3.32. The render_rectangle function in process/gegl-processor.c has unbounded memory allocation, leading to a denial of service (application crash) upon allocation failure.

criterions.comment: gegl package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
